original_text: They took them to the place that is called ‘The Skull ’. There they fixed Jesus to a cross to die. They also fixed the two bad men to crosses. One of these men was on the right side of Jesus. The other was on his left side.
korean_text: 해골이라 하는 곳에 이르러 거기서 예수를 십자가에 못 박고 두 행악자도 그렇게 하니 하나는 우편에, 하나는 좌편에 있더라

sentences.original_text: They took them to the place
There they fixed Jesus to a cross to die
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 그들은 예수님을 죽기 위해 십자가에 못 박았습니다

sentences.original_text: They also fixed the two bad men to crosses
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 두 나쁜 사람들을 십자가에 못 박았습니다

sentences.original_text: One of these men was on the right side of Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들 중 한 명은 예수님의 오른쪽에 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: The other was on his left side
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 한 명은 그의 왼쪽에 있었습니다
